mapper.sql: id, teach_course_no, student_no, semester, normal_score, exam_score, total_score, remark
mapper.select: select sc.id, sc.teach_course_no, s.name student_name, tc.course_no, c.name course_name, c.credit, sc.semester, sc.normal_score, sc.exam_score, sc.total_score, sc.remark from xk_student s, xk_course c, xk_select_course sc, (select teach_course_no, course_no from xk_teach_course) tc where sc.teach_course_no = tc.teach_course_no and sc.student_no = s.student_no and tc.course_no = c.course_no order by teach_course_no asc
